title: The Blue Nile
creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and Kathrine Deng
brief_description: Through civil war Kathrine’s family are forced to change their lives, language and religion and eventually their country. Kathrine and her family are now living in Australia and they feel safe and have a chance to realise their dreams. Kathrine wants to make sure her children understand their cultural heritage and hopes that one day she can show them the Blue Nile.
